entry.title: KPT-22 (red mouse)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Cat Toys
Price: 7.00

Set of 2.

These beautiful handmade felt pet toys are safe and strong and attractive toy option for any cats. The solid felt has no seems and theres no loose tufting. If particles are swallowed they are digestible and far safer than standard toys that have plastics based stuffing and fabrics. Felt pet toy is resilient, comfortable to bite and its also good for keeping teeth clean.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material.
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover.
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

 

Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
